support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS paperback
support.descp: MALEVOLENT VISIONS paperback book documenting the complete artworks from issues #xx-xx of Der Orchideengarten magazine, published in 1920. Softcover, 80 pages, 5.5" x 8.5", $29 retail

support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS book + postcard set
support.descp: MALEVOLENT VISIONS paperback book, PLUS a set of 10 postcards featuring 5 images from the book (2 of each image).

support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS book, postcards + pin
support.descp: MALEVOLENT VISIONS paperback book, the set of 10 postcards, PLUS the Malevolent Visions pin!

support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS + BPAL perfume
support.descp:
The MALEVOLENT VISIONS softcover book, the postcard set, PLUS the limited edition MALEVOLENT VISIONS perfume oil by Black Phoenix Alchemy Lab!
MALEVOLENT VISIONS - Blood orchid, ylang ylang, bourbon vanilla absolute, rose cream, frankincense, pink pepper, clove, and opium tar accord.
Full-size 5mL amber vial.

support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS + SECOND TITLE
support.descp: MALEVOLENT VISIONS softcover book + postcard set, PLUS your choice of an additional softcover book from our 'Art of Der Orchideengarten' or 'Rare Artworks' series!

support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS art package
support.descp:
MALEVOLENT VISIONS softcover book, postcard set, and pin, PLUS your choice of any one (1) 11" x 14" Century Guild Patronage Print or 11" x 14" Malevolent Visions letterpress print (retail $49)!
The Century Guild Patronage Print collection features over 60 rare images, each captured from original antique posters in the museum archive. View the collection at centuryguild.net/collections/patronage-prints

support.title: ART of DER ORCHIDEENGARTEN book series
support.descp: ALL FIVE books in the 'Art of Der Orchideengarten' series- DIABOLICAL FANTASIA, SINISTER HARVEST, ELDRITCH BLOOM, WITHERING HEIGHTS, and MALEVOLENT VISIONS.

support.title: BOOKS + PINS collector's package
support.descp: ALL FIVE books in the 'Art of Der Orchideengarten' series, all five postcard sets, and ALL FIVE of the pins- Demon Crest, Skull Flower, Skull Spider, Homunculus, and Malevolent Visions.

support.title: MALEVOLENT VISIONS + WITHERING HEIGHTS
support.descp:
The MALEVOLENT VISIONS + WITHERING HEIGHTS softcover books, BOTH postcard sets, and BOTH perfumes created by Black Phoenix Alchemy Lab!
MALEVOLENT VISIONS- Blood orchid, ylang ylang, bourbon vanilla absolute, rose cream, frankincense,
pink pepper, clove, and opium tar accord.
WITHERING HEIGHTS- Red musk streaked with black musk seed, leather accord, black diamond shards of gleaming labdanum, and cherry wood.

support.title: COMPLETE LETTERPRESS FOLIO package
support.descp: The MALEVOLENT VISIONS book, postcard set, and the pin, plus ALL FIVE Malevolent Visions letterpress prints, presented in a custom made, hand-marbled paper folio ($300 retail)!

support.title: BOOKS + BPAL collector's package
support.descp: ALL FIVE books in our 'Art of Der Orchideengarten' series, the postcard set, and ALL FIVE corresponding perfumes created by Black Phoenix Alchemy Lab! Diabolical Fantasia, Sinister Harvest, Eldritch Bloom, and Withering Heights were produced in an extremely limited edition, and only available to backers of the Kickstarter projects!

support.title: COMPLETE COLLECTORS PACKAGE
support.descp: All five books in 'The Art of Der Orchideengarten' series, all --- pins, all five postcard sets, and ALL TWENTY-FIVE letterpress prints presented in five custom made, hand marbled paper folios. FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE.

project_data.project_name: MALEVOLENT VISIONS rare 1920s horror scifi art Orchid Garden

support.title: SUPPORT AURORA
support.descp: Support the film and skip the physical items. Thank you!

support.title: DIGITAL DOWNLOADS film + soundtrack
support.descp:
This pledge level gets you the 30 minute film at 1080p resolution (Blu-ray quality) and audio files in your choice of either lossless or compressed formats (AIFF, WAV, or MP3), both delivered to you as digital downloads.
INCLUDES:
Aurora Film (30 minutes, 1080p)
Aurora soundtrack (AIFF, WAV, or MP3)

support.title: 2 DISC SET film + soundtrack CD
support.descp:
This pledge level gets you the special limited edition 2-disc set which includes the film on your choice of either DVD or BLU-RAY, plus a second disc containing the soundtrack on AUDIO CD.
INCLUDES:
Disc #1: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY
Disc #2: Soundtrack on AUDIO CD

support.title: ENAMEL PIN and downloads
support.descp:
This pledge level gets you the 30 minute film at 1080p resolution (Blu-ray quality) and audio files in your choice of either lossless or compressed formats (AIFF, WAV, or MP3), both delivered to you as digital downloads PLUS the terrifyingly adorable PANGO creature enamel pin by Tony Maldonado... complete with BLINKING eyes of furrily furious rage!
INCLUDES:
Aurora Film (30 minutes, 1080p)
Aurora soundtrack (AIFF, WAV, or MP3)
BLINKING EYE Pango enamel pin ($13 retail)

support.title: T-SHIRT and download
support.descp:
This pledge level gets you the 30 minute film at 1080p resolution (Blu-ray quality) and audio files in your choice of either lossless or compressed formats (AIFF, WAV, or MP3), both delivered to you as digital downloads PLUS the Kickstarter exclusive backer-only vintage-style silkscreened AURORA shirt, available in both men's and women's cuts. (You'll choose in the survey.)
INCLUDES:
Aurora Film (30 minutes, 1080p)
Aurora soundtrack (AIFF, WAV, or MP3)
Kickstarter exclusive shirt ($32 retail)

support.title: Soundtrack on VINYL (Variant 1)
support.descp:
For the fan of all things vintage! This pledge level gets you the Aurora soundtrack on the limited edition CONSTELLATION 10" VINYL record (edition of 600) PLUS the special limited edition 2-disc set.
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
CONSTELLATION variant - soundtrack on 10" VINYL

support.title: Soundtrack on VINYL (Variant 2)
support.descp:
For the fan of all things vintage! This pledge level gets you the Aurora soundtrack on the limited edition MARTIAN 10" VINYL record (edition of 100) PLUS the special limited edition 2-disc set.
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
MARTIAN variant - soundtrack on 10" VINYL

support.title: Limited edition ART POSTER
support.descp:
This pledge level gets you ONE of six limited edition high-quality ART POSTER featuring original artwork created specifically for Aurora, PLUS the special limited edition 2-disc set. Choose from BROM, Dave McKean, Gail Potocki, Jeremy Bastian, Andrew Ritchie, or Xul1349. You'll make your print selection when we send out the Kickstarter survey after the close of the campaign. *Add on any additional posters for $40/each. No extra postage required.
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
One (1) fine ART PRINT of your choice

support.title: Limited edition metal TINTYPE facsimile
support.descp:
Get even more serious about the vintage aesthetic with the EXTREMELY LIMITED EDITION 8" x 10" metal facsimile of a wet-plate Aurora TINTYPE PHOTO by Anton Orlov, PLUS the special limited edition 2-disc set. Choose from THE CREATURE, THE PILOT, SERGEANT WEEMS, LAWMEN IN ACTION, and SGT. WEEMS ON HORSEBACK. You'll make your photo selection when we send out the Kickstarter survey after the close of the campaign. *Add on any additional prints for $65/each. No extra postage required.
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
One (1) 8"x10" metal fascimile TINTYPE photo

support.title: 1897 WAX CYLINDER
support.descp:
The most peculiarly analog tier: the ultra-limited (each one hand-molded) 1897-STYLE WAX CYLINDER with a two-minute recording featuring "The Creature Speaks," a track NOT on the CD, VINYL, or DOWNLOAD. Yes, in the spirit of the film, you will need a wax cylinder player to hear this song featuring Genesis Breyer P-Orridge, Armen Ra, Troy Sterling Nies, and Brian Viglione! INCLUDES the special limited edition 2-disc set.
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
1897 style WAX CYLINDER record

support.title: Soundtrack on glow VINYL (Variant 3)
support.descp:
It's not just thoroughly vintage in style, it's glowing in the dark! This pledge level gets you the Aurora soundtrack on a gorgeous GLOW-IN-THE-DARK 10" VINYL record (edition of 23) PLUS the special limited edition 2-disc set. Note: this level ships via USPS Priority (domestic + international).
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
GLOW-IN-THE-DARK variant - soundtrack on 10" Vinyl

support.title: COMPLETE ARTWORK PACKAGE
support.descp:
This pledge level gets you ALL SIX limited edition high-quality ART POSTERS featuring original artwork created specifically for Aurora from Brom, Dave McKean, Gail Potocki, Jeremy Bastian, Andrew Ritchie, and Xul1347... PLUS! A special FACSIMILE BLUEPRINT of Brom's original design for the Fledermaus Pilot (not available separately). INCLUDES the special limited edition 2-disc set.
INCLUDES:
2-DISC SET: Film on DVD or BLU-RAY + soundtrack AUDIO CD
ALL SIX art posters

support.title: AURORA BOX
support.descp:
All the design decadence we can summon encapsulated in one treasure chest!
- A deluxe hand-bound photo book (signed by the directors and as many actors as we can get our hands on), containing the film on your choice of DVD or Blu-Ray and the soundtrack CD.
- A hand-molded 1897-style wax cylinder.
- A set of facsimile tintypes in a special presentation folio.
- Newspaper + clipping facsimiles (both as seen in film).
- Miniature versions of ALL SIX official release posters SIGNED by the artists (Jeremy Bastian, Brom, Dave McKean, Gail Potocki, and Andrew Ritchie).
- Fledermaus costume design blueprint (signed by Brom).

support.title: AURORA BOX + SCREEN THANKS + EXHIBITION
support.descp:
Now you're totally involved. This pledge includes:
- The AURORA BOX with all the design decadence we can summon, in one treasure chest!
- Your name will be thanked in the deluxe photo book and ONSCREEN in the credits of the film.
PLUS!
You and a guest are invited to the private film preview screening and reception for the cast and crew in Los Angeles at The Century Guild Museum of Art, with a special exhibition of props and original artworks from the film on display. Event is estimated to be December 2017, items will ship in March 2018.
(Date is subject to change. Screening will occur in the Los Angeles area. You are responsible for ensuring your availability, as well as all travel and accommodation costs. Refunds will not be provided should you be unable to attend.

support.title: ASSOCIATE PRODUCER: THE KEY
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: a screen-used key from the climactic jail scene.
PLUS!
- ASSOCIATE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).
- Your name thanked in the deluxe book, and listed both onscreen and on IMDb in the credits for the film.
- VIP access at any private or public Aurora events or exhibitions we host (see $1000 pledge for example).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE LAWMAN
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: the Deputy's screen-used blank gun from the climactic jail scene.
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).
- Your name thanked in the deluxe book, and listed both onscreen and on IMDb in the credits for the film.
- VIP access at any private or public Aurora events or exhibitions we host (see $1000 pledge for example).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE SERGEANT
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: the Sergeant's screen-used blank gun from the climactic jail scene.
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE FLEDERMAUS
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: the screen-used Fledermaus notebook (cover only); important and secret plot element!
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).
- Your name thanked in the deluxe book, and listed both onscreen and on IMDb in the credits for the film.
- VIP access at any private or public Aurora events or exhibitions we host (see $1000 pledge for example).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE CREATURE
support.descp:
The biggest pledge of all gets you something absolutely unique and hand-made: the WALL-MOUNTED HEAD OF THE CREATURE. Rayce Bird will create a head for you from his original molds and carefully hand-paint it to match the movie costume. AND YES- THE EYES LIGHT UP!
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).
- Your name thanked in the deluxe book, and listed both onscreen and on IMDb in the credits for the film.
- VIP access at any private or public Aurora events or exhibitions we host (see $1000 pledge for example).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE WILD WEST
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: the screen-used custom handmade knife from the climactic jail scene.
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).
- Your name thanked in the deluxe book, and listed both onscreen and on IMDb in the credits for the film.
- VIP access at any private or public Aurora events or exhibitions we host (see $1000 pledge for example).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE TRAVELLER
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: the screen-used newspaper clipping; an important and secret plot element!
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).
- Your name thanked in the deluxe book, and listed both onscreen and on IMDb in the credits for the film.
- VIP access at any private or public Aurora events or exhibitions we host (see $1000 pledge for example).

support.title: EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: THE COWBOY
support.descp:
This pledge gets you an original movie prop: the screen-used cowboy hat prominently worn by Jack Campbell in his portrayal of historical figure Sergeant T. J. Weems.
PLUS!
- EXECUTIVE PRODUCER CREDIT both ONSCREEN and on IMDb.
- The Aurora Box (all items personalized by the directors if desired).

project_data.project_name: The Pad Project

support.title: Shout Out and Thank You
support.descp: Your name on our programmes, website and a thank you tweet

support.title: Guide to your senses: Month of Play
support.descp:
EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO ONLINE GUIDE
Especially curated for Kickstarter; everyday in October, BitterSuite will send you an update of music, ponderings, somatic and sensory games and techniques specially designed by the company's artistic director and creative team.
Month of Play will open up new ways for you to experience your day to day environment, interactions and perspectives.

support.title: Personal touches BRONZE
support.descp:
Your name on our programmes, website and a thank you tweet
PLUS a personalised "TOUCH ME" tote bag

support.title: Personal touches SILVER
support.descp:
Your name on our material, a thank you tweet PLUS a personalised "TOUCH ME" tote bag
PLUS Subscription to the month of play

support.title: Personal touches GOLD
support.descp:
Your name on our material, a thank you tweet
PLUS a personalised "TOUCH ME" tote bag
PLUS original sketches of graphic notations created for the process
PLUS a subscription to the Month of Play

support.title: Experience: BitterSuite's process
support.descp:
Be a BitterSuite Tester!
Find out first hand what we're up to before we premier. With this reward we invite you to our devising workshop to be a body to test our new experience on!

support.title: Experience: Pilates and Somatic Practice
support.descp: One-to-one or group somatic and Pilates practice session available with expert practitioner Anna Pearce

support.title: Experience: Synaesthetic Thinking
support.descp: A masterclass with the BitterSuite Artistic Director Stephanie Singer - leading you through the intricacies and creativity involved in applying synaesthesia to creativity, and cross-modality and how this can impact your creativity

support.title: Personalised Synaesthetic Composition
support.descp:
Collaborate with composer and BitterSuite's resident synaesthete, Lawrence Becko.
Based on a description of yourself and your name Lawrence will compose a synaesthetic, musical response that conveys his synaesthetic experience of your name and characteristics.

support.title: Experience: Music Masterclass
support.descp: A private music lesson with internationally regarded violinist, composer and leader of string ensemble Phaedra Phillip Grannel.

support.title: Private Classical Concert
support.descp:
A private string quartet performance in a space of your choosing, with a musical programme curated just for you.
This can be an event for family, friends, clients, your front room, business park or elsewhere. Offered by Phaedra Ensemble.
All shipping costs to be negotiated.

support.title: Experience: Private Meal for Six
support.descp:
A private meal for SIX people with a SEVEN COURSE tasting menu of sensory treats and delights and culinary mastery with Chef Of The Year Finalist Adam Thomasson.
To take place in his kitchen in North London.

support.title: Exclusive BitterSuite Experience
support.descp:
A single ticket to an exclusive, fully sensory BitterSuite concert
DATE: 22nd October, >>3pm<<
VENUE: disclosed upon pledge
PLUS Refreshments
UK ONLY
INCLUDES:
10× Tickets to the experience

support.title: Exclusive BitterSuite Experience
support.descp:
A single ticket to an exclusive, fully sensory BitterSuite concert
DATE: 22nd October, >>3pm<<
VENUE: disclosed upon pledge
PLUS Refreshments
PLUS Touch Me Tote Bag
PLUS Special edition of London Smooth fragrance by Sarah McCartney
INCLUDES:
10× Tickets to the experience

support.descp:

DATE: 22nd October, >>3pm<<

Reward also includes:
Added sensory refreshments
A "TOUCH ME" tote bag
PLUS Special edition of London Smooth fragrance by Sarah McCartney

5× 2 tickets for the experience

support.title: Exclusive BitterSuite Experience for 2
support.descp:

DATE: 22nd October, >>6pm<<
VENUE: disclosed upon pledge
Reward also includes:

support.title: Experience: Movement & Taste Masterclass
support.descp: Be guided by practitioner Eileih Muir in how to think differently about flavour and restaurants - how can thinking about the physical body inside restaurant spaces impact on our decisions within the restaurant, performance and the creative sector.

support.title: Dance & Movement Psychotherapy
support.descp: One-to-one Dance & Movement therapy workshop with trained NHS practitioner Marah Wilson

support.title: Experience: Psychology Masterclass
support.descp: A private Psychology session exploring your brain, your world and perception in relation to synaesthesia with Dr Clare Jonas (UEL)

support.title: Experience: Perfume Workshop
support.descp: Have a private perfume making workshop with award winning perfumer Sarah McCartney, designing and building your very own scent

support.title: Experience: Your very own BitterSuite
support.descp:
22nd October
A fully private concert decked out for you, friends, family, clients.
Bespoke cocktails
Touch me tote bag
Essential Oils
Surprise gifts
and Private musical massage
